name: “Fried” Chicken Sandwich
description: A crispy chicken sandwich that rivals the most popular takeout joints!
preparation: Preheat oven to 425° F. Place two Cooling Racks on Sheet Pan lined with Sheet Pan Liner; lightly brush racks with oil to prevent sticking.
Place mix in a shallow dish. Using tongs or your hands, add chicken thighs one at time, gently rotating and pressing to coat.
Place chicken on racks, leaving some space between each piece. Bake 15–17 min or until golden and cooked through.
Slice pickle into rounds. Spread dip on top and bottom buns. Add lettuce and pickles to bottom bun; top with cooked chicken. Cover with top bun.
tips: To reduce sodium, omit pickles and use yogurt to coat chicken.
Feeling indulgent? Swap buns with prepared Quick Biscuits for a biscuit sandwich.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1 cup sliced veggies and 2 tbsp Epicure Dip, your choice.

products.name: Crispy & Crunchy Coating (Pkg of 3)
summary: Craving the crunch? Add a crispy gluten free coating – that’s never soggy or bland – to protein and veggies and bake them in the oven. You’ll get all the taste of your fave fried foods without a trace of greasiness, so you can enjoy them whenever the craving strikes!
